Uses of Package
items

Packages that use items
Package Description
gui
Contains all the GUI classes and modules
islands
Contains all the islands and island-associated classes (like Route)
items
Contains all upgrades and item classes
main
Core package - Contains all the important classes that can't be categorized
ships
Contains all the ships
  • Classes in items used by gui
    Class Description
    Item
    The superclass of all item types.
  • Classes in items used by islands
    Class Description
    Item
    The superclass of all item types.
    TradeGood
    A tradable good.
    TradeTypes
    Represents all the different types of tradable goods.
    Upgrade
    Superclass for all items which give the ship an advantage, e.g.
  • Classes in items used by items
    Class Description
    Cannon
    Cannons are upgrade items, used to increase combat rolls.
    Item
    The superclass of all item types.
    Sail
    Sails are upgrade items, used to decrease the time to get between Islands.
    TradeGood
    A tradable good.
    TradeTypes
    Represents all the different types of tradable goods.
    Upgrade
    Superclass for all items which give the ship an advantage, e.g.
  • Classes in items used by main
    Class Description
    Item
    The superclass of all item types.
  • Classes in items used by ships
    Class Description
    Item
    The superclass of all item types.
